name: LavaBlock
title: LavaBlock
author: Zoltán Tamás Szabó
description: Start on a tiny island surrounded by lava! Extract all resources from lava using chemical plants. No traditional mining - convert lava into stone, coal, iron, copper & wood. Expand your island only through research-unlocked foundation. Custom map preset, modified tech tree, extreme space constraints create unique survival challenge. Perfect for players seeking fresh Factorio experience!
